featured.text: The elderly will become more mobile.
Guests may enjoy facilities such as free Wi-Fi, mobile charging, and even a soundless alarm system that raises the sleeping guests into a seated position while gradually brightening the lights.

definition.zh_def: 可移動的，能夠在不同地方使用或攜帶的。
definition.en_def: Able to be moved or carried easily; portable.
definition.example: She bought a mobile phone to stay connected while traveling.
